name: Offensive Qualities
description: Advanced combat qualities for all Digimon

qualities.name: ARMOR PIERCING
qualities.description:
On first purchase, apply the **[PIERCING]** Tag to one **[DAMAGE]** Attack. The Tag is applicable to only that attack.

An Attack with the **[PIERCING]** Tag deals extra **Unalterable Damage** on a hit **for each Accuracy Success over the Target's Dodge Successes**. The **Maximum Unalterable Damage** equals the Digimon's **Ranks** in this Quality.

A Digimon may not have **[PIERCING]** and **[CERTAIN]** on the same Attack, unless they apply both tags to its **Signature Move**.

qualities.name: CERTAIN STRIKE
qualities.description:
On first purchase, apply the **[CERTAIN]** Tag to one **[DAMAGE]** Attack. The Tag is applicable to only that attack.

An attack with the **[CERTAIN]** Tag gains **Automatic Successes** equal to the **Ranks** in this Quality.

A Digimon may not have **[PIERCING]** and **[CERTAIN]** on the same Attack, unless they apply both tags to its **Signature Move**.

qualities.name: CHARGE ATTACK
qualities.description:
The Digimon may apply the **[CHARGE]** Tag to one **[MELEE]** Attack.

The **[CHARGE]** Tag allows the Digimon to both use the Tagged Attack and **Move** with **1 Action** either before or after the Attack.

**The Move granted by this attack must be made in a straight line.**

qualities.name: AMMO
qualities.description:
The Digimon may apply the **[AMMO]** Tag to one Attack.

An Attack with the **[AMMO]** Tag ignores the one Attack per Round rule. The Digimon can only use this Attack **Once per Combat**.

**This cannot apply to a Signature Move**.

qualities.name: RELOAD
qualities.description:
**REQUIREMENT: AMMO**

The Digimon may apply the **[AMMO]** Tag to one Attack.

An Attack with the **[AMMO]** Tag ignores the one Attack per Round rule. The Digimon can only use this Attack **Once per Combat**.

**This cannot apply to a Signature Move**.

qualities.name: HEAVY RECOIL
qualities.description:
The Digimon may apply the **[RECOIL]** Tag to one **[RANGE]** Attack. The Attack's **Range** and **Effective Limit** is halved.

When the Attack is made, the Digimon is pushed away from its target a number of **Spaces** equal to its **Stage**. If a **[DAMAGE]** Attack Tagged with **[RECOIL]** gets at least 1 **Accuracy Success** over the Target's **Dodge Successes**, the Target is affected with **[PUSH]** with the same **Potency**.

You cannot use an Attack with this Tag in **Sentry Stance**.

qualities.name: HUGE POWER I
qualities.description:
**Once per round**, the Digimon may reroll any 1's that appear when making an **Accuracy Check**.

**This Quality does not affect Bonus Dice granted from Tamer Actions.**

qualities.name: HUGE POWER II
qualities.description:
**Once per round**, the Digimon may reroll any 1's and 2's that appear when making an **Accuracy Check**.

**This Quality does not affect Bonus Dice granted from Tamer Actions.**

qualities.name: AGGRESSIVE FLANK
qualities.description:
**INCOMPATIBLE: HORDE DUELIST**

The Digimon gains a bonus to its **Accuracy Check** equal to its **Stage** or its **RAM**, whichever is higher, whenever the Digimon is adjacent to an **Ally** and both are adjacent to the same Enemy.

This only applies to the Digimon with **AGGRESSIVE FLANK**.

qualities.name: COUNTERATTACK
qualities.description:
If an Enemy misses with an **Attack** against you, you may take an **Interrupt Action** to make an **Attack** with the Attacker as the Target. The Target suffers a Penalty to **DOD** equal to the Digimon's **Stage**.

This can only be used a number of times per Combat equal to the **Ranks** in this Quality.

qualities.name: HORDE DUELIST
qualities.description:
**INCOMPATIBLE: AGGRESSIVE FLANK**

When the Digimon is only adjacent to Enemies, it can use **1 Action** to make a **BIT (Survival) Check**.

**Success**: grants a bonus to **ACC** equal to its **BIT** on **Attacks** made against adjacent Enemies with no **Allies** adjacent to the Target until the start of its next turn.
**Critical Success**: also regains the **Action** spent.

qualities.name: HIDE IN PLAIN SIGHT
qualities.description:
The Digimon can make a **Stealth Check** as 1 **Action**, rather than 2 **Actions** to vanish from sight. This can only be done **Once per Turn**.

Once the Digimon does anything to interfere with another participant in combat, such as make an **Attack** against them, they are no longer hidden.

qualities.name: SHADE CLOAK
qualities.description:
When the Digimon makes a **Stealth Check**, it can use 1 extra **Action** to cause any **Allies** of its choice within a number of **Spaces** equal to the Digimon's **RAM** to be treated as if they have the same result and benefit.

If any **Ally** benefitting from this Quality would interfere with another Digimon, the benefit ends for all Digimon.

qualities.name: SNEAK ATTACK
qualities.description: The Digimon may apply the **[SNEAK]** Tag to one **Attack**. If the Digimon is making an **Attack** with the **[SNEAK]** Tag against a Target it is currently hidden from, it gains a bonus to **ACC** equal to its **RAM** for that **Attack**.

qualities.name: SIMPLIFIED STRIKE
qualities.description:
The Digimon may apply the **[SIMPLE]** Tag to one **Attack**. Whenever the Digimon would make that **Attack**, it takes 1 less **Action**, to a minimum of 1 **Action**.

This cannot be used to reduce the **Action** cost of **Attack Effects**.

qualities.name: BATTLE CRY
qualities.description:
The Digimon can make a **Battle Cry** as 1 **Action**, rolling a **DOS (Bravery) Check**.

The Digimon and each **Ally** within a number of **Spaces** equal to the Digimon's **DOS** gain the effect of **[BASTION]** until the start of the Digimon's next turn.

After this Quality has been used once, the **TN** increases by 6 for consecutive use until the end of Combat.

qualities.name: BOMBARDMENT
qualities.description: The **Damage** dealt by the Digimon's **Area Attacks** cannot be reduced (after **Armor**) by an amount higher than the Target's **Stage**.

qualities.name: FIREWALL BYPASS
qualities.description: When you make an **Area Attack** with the **[SUPPORT]** Tag, the **Potency** and **Duration** of **Attack Effects** is no longer reduced.

qualities.name: AREA ATTACK: T:BLAST
qualities.description:
The **Attack** creates a circular zone that originates somewhere within the Userâ€™s **Effective Limit**. It has a Base Radius of 1 **Space**, but the Attacker may add half its **BIT** to the Radius.

This **Area Attack** can only be applied to **[RANGE]** Attacks.

qualities.name: AREA ATTACK: T:BURST
qualities.description:
The **Attack** affects a number of **Spaces** around the Attacker. It has a Base Range of 1 **Space**, but the Attacker may add half its **DOS** to the Radius.

This **Attack** goes outward from the Attacker, and thus the Attacker is not considered a Target for the purposes of **Damage** or **Effects**.

qualities.name: AREA ATTACK: T:CONE
qualities.description: The **Attack** creates a 90 degree cone which originates adjacent to the user. The shape has a Base Length of 2 **Spaces**, but the Attacker may add its **BIT** to the length.

qualities.name: AREA ATTACK: T:LINE
qualities.description:
The **Attack** creates a pillar adjacent to the User, with a Base Length of 3 **Spaces**. The Attacker may add its **CPU** to the range.

If the pillar would hit a solid wall, it may â€˜bounceâ€™ off of the wall, and potentially hit additional targets (but a Target can only be hit once). The pillarâ€™s width is 1 **Space** as a minimum, but the user may increase the width by 1 **Space** for each **Size** it is larger than **Large**.

qualities.name: AREA ATTACK: T:PASS
qualities.description:
The **Attack** allows the user to charge in a straight line in a given direction, hitting every Target along the way. When declaring an **Area Attack**, the user **Moves** a Base Distance equal to their **RAM** in a straight line, and cannot change their direction.

A **[T:PASS]** Attack requires the Attacker to **Move** to use; so if the user has a Pass Attack they must use 2 **Actions** to use it. However, if the Attack also has the **[CHARGE]** Tag, it may be used as 1 **Action** instead, and the Digimon may also add to the distance travelled up to its **Movement**.

This **Area Attack** can only be applied to **[MELEE]** Attacks.

qualities.name: AREA ATTACK: T:WAVE
qualities.description: The **Attack** creates a circular zone that can be placed anywhere adjacent to the Attacker. The zone itself has a Base Radius of 2 **Spaces**, but the Attacker may add half its **DOS** to the Radius.

qualities.name: SELECTIVE TARGETING I
qualities.description:
**INCOMPATIBLE: BOMBARDMENT, FIREWALL BYPASS**

The Digimon's **Area Attack** tagged Attacks will no longer be able to **Damage Allies** or place negative **Effects** on them. Enemies the Digimon attacks will not be able to gain benefits from positive **Effects**.

When the Digimon targets a specific Digimon with an **Attack** that is locked in a **Clash** with someone else, the Target Digimon only benefits from their own **CPU** for **Armor**.

If the Digimon makes a **[CLEANSE]** Tagged Attack, it can choose to only reduce the **duration** of Positive **Effects** or Negative **Effects**.

qualities.name: SELECTIVE TARGETING II
qualities.description:
**INCOMPATIBLE: BOMBARDMENT, FIREWALL BYPASS, DATA SPECIALIZATION: STATUS WARLORD**

Whenever the Digimon makes an **Attack** with an **Area Attack Tag** and an **Effect Tag**, it can change the **Tags** of the Attack: The **Attack** is treated as **[DAMAGE]** for Enemies and **[SUPPORT]** for **Allies**, or the **Effect** does not affect Enemies.

This can be used to turn a **[SUPPORT]** Attack meant for **Allies** into a **[DAMAGE]** Attack for Enemies while still providing benefits to allies.
